column5: Spacious two story home with a private bedroom and bath upstairs for your convenience. Centrally located to shopping malls, nature trails, restaurants and bars the area is quiet and neat. From our house you are a 5 minute walk to parks, convenience stores, post office, supermarket, fast food, 24 hr pharmacy, movie theater, golf course and a 20 minute walk to the downtown square for restaurants, pubs and the Mckinney library. We do not have children living in the home.
